direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle asset transfers between accounts but for different types (futures vs. margin).
Both methods involve transferring assets between accounts, though the context (sub-account to sub-account vs. futures transfer) differs.
Both methods involve asset transfers with similar parameter checks and control flows.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized for sending signed requests.
Both methods require parameter checks before proceeding with the transfer.
Both methods need to verify the status of the transfer operation, handling potential exceptions similarly.
